item.title: [c21] Dazzling Sphinx
item.description:
Creature — Sphinx

Flying

Whenever Dazzling Sphinx deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then that player puts the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of their library in a random order.

item.title: [c21] Veyran, Voice of Duality
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Efreet Wizard

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Veyran, Voice of Duality gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

If you casting or copying an instant or sorcery spell causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

item.title: [c21] Rousing Refrain
item.description:
Sorcery

Add {R} for each card in target opponent's hand. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. Exile Rousing Refrain with three time counters on it.

Suspend 3—{1}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [c21] Inspiring Refrain
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw two cards. Exile Inspiring Refrain with three time counters on it.

Suspend 3—{2}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {2}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [c21] Dispeller's Capsule
item.description:
Artifact

{2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Dispeller's Capsule: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [c21] Dispatch
item.description:
Instant

Tap target creature.

Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.

item.title: [c21] Darksteel Mutation
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature is an Insect artifact creature with base power and toughness 0/1 and has indestructible, and it loses all other abilities, card types, and creature types.

item.title: [c21] Cleansing Nova
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy all creatures.

• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

item.title: [c21] Sun Titan
item.description:
Creature — Giant

Vigilance

Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [c21] Sanctum Gargoyle
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Gargoyle

Flying

When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [c21] Rout
item.description:
Sorcery

You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)

Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

item.title: [c21] Return to Dust
item.description:
Instant

Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [c21] Hoard-Smelter Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.

item.title: [c21] Hellkite Igniter
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying, haste

{1}{R}: Hellkite Igniter gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

item.title: [c21] Chain Reaction
item.description:
Sorcery

Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

item.title: [c21] Quicksmith Genius
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Pia Nalaar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

When Pia Nalaar enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

{1}{R}: Target artifact creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.

item.title: [c21] Jor Kadeen, the Prevailer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

First strike

Metalcraft — Creatures you control get +3/+0 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

item.title: [c21] Burnished Hart
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Elk

{3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Boros Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.

• Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

• Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Scrap Trawler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser converted mana cost.

item.title: [c21] Pilgrim's Eye
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Thopter

Flying

When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

White spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.

item.title: [j21] Karlov of the Ghost Council
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Advisor

Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Karlov of the Ghost Council.

{W}{B}, Remove six +1/+1 counters from Karlov of the Ghost Council: Exile target creature.

Artifact Creature — Dragon

Flying

item.title: [c21] Hellkite Tyrant
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying, trample

Whenever Hellkite Tyrant deals combat damage to a player, gain control of all artifacts that player controls.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more artifacts, you win the game.
